(Sorry for not replying sooner, but yesterday I had a football game to win, 
which we did, 20-14 when we scored a safety and the winning touchdown in the 
last minute of the fourth quarter when we were under 6-14 by the third, and I 
had to go to dinner for my brother's girlfriend's birthday, so I got home 
late)

Nemesis Enforcer/Serpentor/Scattershot/Punch/Unitron:



Nemesis Enforcer's vision blurred for a second and then he suddenly appeared 
to be floating over nothingness, a dark void below him, and a gigantic blue 
orb in front of him.

He soon heard words, only they were in his mind, not as a voice.

-VULOIS IS NO LONGER A THREAT, THOUGH YOU FAILED TO EXTERMINATE HIM-

"I did my best!  I'm not in control of this group!"

-IT DOES NOT MATTER, HE IS NOW AN ALLIANCE MEMBER, AND IF HE LEAVES, HE WILL 
MOST CERTAINLY DIE, PEACE BETWEEN THE MANY FACTIONS OF THE BEAST WARS IS NO 
LONGER A POSSIBILITY-

Nemsis Enforcer held a hand against the side of his, the booming voice 
hurting him.

-BUT, THROUGH YOUR FAILURE YOU HAVE CAUSED AN EVEN GREATER THREAT.  VULOIS' 
APPRENTICE, CHILD, MEANS TO TURN CYBERTRON INTO AN ORGANIC PLANET.  THIS MUST 
NOT BE ALLOWED.  YOU MUST GAIN MORE FOLLOWERES, YOU MUST UNITE WITH 
SHOCKWAVE, SERPENTOR, SCATTERSHOT, AND UNITRON IF YOU ARE TO CRUSH THE 
UPCOMING REPUBLIC OF HEAVEN.  THOUGH YOU WILL HAVE FURTHER AID FROM A NEW 
FACTION-

Nemesis Enforcer was about to reply to the Matrix, but his vision ended.  He 
shook his head.

Punch sighed loudly, opening his mouth again.  "HEY!  YOU TWO GO OUTSIDE TO 
ZARDUS, I'll STAY IN THE BRIDGE!"

Nemesis looked to Scattershot, knowing he had just had the same vision as 
him.  The two ran to get out of the Alliance base.

-----

Serpentor stepped out of the Alliance base, plasma launcher ready.  He had 
just recovered from a strange vision.  He was supposed to ally up with a 
bunch of losers!  He looked around and spotted Zardus.

"What's the scoop?"

---

Unitron ignored everyone in the room, including Vulois, and calmly walked 
outside, not receiving a vision of any kind.  It was the task of Nemesis 
Enforcer to make him aware.
